abstractContent.text: This paper presents a syntactical method of interpreting pronouns in Polish, Using the surface structure of the sentence as well as grammatical and inflexional inlormation accessible during syntactic analysis, an area of reference is marked out for each personal and possessive pronoun.
This area consists of a few internal areas inside the current sentence and an external area, i.e. the part of the text preceding it.
In order to determine that area of reference several syntactic sentence-level restrictions on anaphora interpretation are formulated.
